title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 203.7 - U-turns
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 203.7 - U-turns

State Regulations

The making of a U-turn at any point on the authority
facilities is prohibited unless under the direction of an authority agent or
employee. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
203.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
